changelog: Changed all SQL 'DATE' formats to varchar(64)
Fixed a bug with coordinates in quasar-housing
Fixed a bug in ps-dispatch related to alert time
Added the ability to change the prop and animation in the config file, and updated the animation to be more realistic
Fixed a bug where MDT wouldn't focus, allowing the player to fight with MDT open (ensure the prop resource is started)
Updated bodycam code to allow viewing from a greater distance
